links - the links of this network
outputSourceIds - the ids of the nodes in this network that are visible outside
inputTargetIds - the ids of the nodes in this network that are expected to receive signals from outside

prepareBeforeHook

protected void prepareBeforeHook()
A pre-processing hook for AbstractStandardXComponent.prepare().

This method clears the data map. If a specialization of this type overrides this method, it should take care to call the overriden version.

Overrides:
prepareBeforeHook in class AbstractStandardXComponent

calculate

public final void calculate()
A processing hook for AbstractStandardXComponent.update(XTime) in the StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase.CALCULATE phase.

By default, does nothing, but may be overriden by specializations of AbstractStandardXComponent.
